column4: a soldier sent to distant lands
one capital where he stopped at the apartment of a poor, old woman
the apartment of a poor, old woman
all the windows and doors in the palace
the sign of the orthodox cross
the other side of the room
raked him over according to his will
a plan to drive that soldier out of the palace
to buy him off with gold
more than enough money for a whole lifetime
a carriage, horses and more than enough money for a whole lifetime
a road to a certain village
a walk with his old comrade
